{{Infobox musical artist | name = Terry Garland | image = | caption = | image_size = | background = solo_singer | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1953|06|03|mf=y}}
[[Johnson City, Tennessee|Johnson City]], [[Tennessee]], United States | instrument = [[Guitar]], [[human voice|vocals]] | genre = [[Blues]] | occupation = [[Guitarist]], [[singing|singer]], [[songwriter]] | years_active = Late 1980s–present | label = [[BMG Records|BMG]]/First Warning, Planetary, Silvermoon | associated_acts = | website = {{URL|http://www.terrygarland.com|Official website}} }} '''Terry Garland''' (born June 3, 1953, [[Johnson City, Tennessee|Johnson City]], [[Tennessee]], United States) is an [[United States|American]] [[blues]] [[guitarist]], [[songwriter]] and [[singing|singer]]. [[Allmusic]] [[music journalism|journalist]], Niles J. Frantz stated "Garland is [[country blues]] interpreter who plays a [[National String Instrument Corporation|National]] [[steel guitar]], often with a [[slide guitar|slide]], in the style of [[Bukka White]] and [[Fred McDowell]]."{{cite web|author=Niles J. Frantz |url=http://www.allmusic.com/artist/terry-garland-mn0000023806/biography |title=Terry Garland | Biography |publisher=AllMusic |date=1953-06-03 |accessdate=2014-01-29}} ==Biography== His two earliest [[album]]s were released on [[BMG Records|BMG]]/First Warning.{{cite book | first= Tony | last= Russell | year= 1997 | title= The Blues: From Robert Johnson to Robert Cray | edition= | publisher= Carlton Books Limited | location= Dubai | page= 113 | isbn= 1-85868-255-X}} The [[harmonica]] player, Mark Wenner, from [[The Nighthawks]] contributed to Garland's [[Gramophone record|records]]. His most recent release was ''Whistling in the Dark'', issued in 2006.{{cite web|url=http://www.allmusic.com/album/whistling-in-the-dark-mw0000579808 |title=Whistling in the Dark - Terry Garland | Songs, Reviews, Credits, Awards |publisher=AllMusic |date= |accessdate=2014-01-29}} ==Discography== *''Trouble in Mind'' (1991) *''Edge of the Valley'' (1992) *''The One to Blame'' (1991) *''Out Where the Blue Begins'' (2001) *''Whistling in the Dark'' (2006){{cite web|author= |url=http://www.allmusic.com/artist/terry-garland-mn0000023806/discography |title=Terry Garland | Discography |publisher=AllMusic |date=1953-06-03 |accessdate=2014-01-29}} ==See also== *[[List of slide guitarists]] *[[List of country blues musicians]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[{{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p346|pure_url=yes}} Biography] at [[Allmusic]] *[http://www.terrygarland.com/biography.html Biography at Terrygarland.com] *[http://www.nme.com/artists/terry-garland Photograph and videos at NME.com] {{Authority control|VIAF=75928090}} {{Persondata | NAME =Garland, Terry | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION =[[United States|American]] [[blues]] guitarist, songwriter and singer | DATE OF BIRTH =June 3, 1953 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Johnson City, Tennessee]], United States | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Garland, Terry}} [[Category:1953 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:American blues guitarists]] [[Category:Slide guitarists]] [[Category:American blues musicians]] [[Category:American male singers]] [[Category:American blues singers]] [[Category:Songwriters from Tennessee]] [[Category:People from Johnson City, Tennessee]] [[Category:Musicians from Tennessee]]
